CEDARWOOD: A 9-letter word related to channel surfing.
EUCALYPTUS: Any of many trees, of genus Eucalyptus, native mainly to Australia.
LAVENDER: Any of a group of European plants, genus, Lavandula, of the mint family.
PATCHOULI: Any of several East Indian plants in the genus Pogostemon, especially Pogostemon cablin, which yield a highly fragrant oil.
